text: well I notice outside tree started
falling which I was not alarmed by that
within under the door black water
started coming in which I thought
something was really wrong so I looked
out the window and the water was rising
outside the window quite fast so I put
the kids on top of the highest thing in
the living room the cabinet the TV
cabinet the TV cabinet began to float we
all climbed on it and as it floated
towards the ceiling was able to punch
holes in the ceiling it's made of a thin
material card hard hard to flex punch
holes in the ceiling so we crawled in
side the ceiling in between the ceiling
and the seam roof the metal roof and
then just set up there and for about two
and a half hours watched and prayed that
the Lord would not allow it to rise any
higher so it got it within about two
feet of the roof where we were sitting
and after that
after that it's just really that's just
death and devastation everywhere bodies
laying everywhere
people need help people need help
